title: Stages’ Power Meters for Ultegra R8100 Now Shipping
content:
Stages' dual-sided power meters are now available on Shimano Ultegra R8100. Get a fresh crankset with it preinstalled, or send in your own cranks and…

The post Stages’ Power Meters for Ultegra R8100 Now Shipping appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
